SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.dtos

Class ActivationTokenDTO

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.dtos.ActivationTokenDTO
public class ActivationTokenDTO extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing an activation token. Stores token details associated with a temporary user.
